modules.name: 8xlfo
modules.description: 8x LFO with full CV control and bpm sync

modules.name: 8xatn
modules.description: 8 attenuverters with cv control anx x2 signal boost

modules.name: PreSetSeq
modules.description: Preset scanner/sequencer for 8 parameters with 8 save slots

modules.name: vcClk
modules.description: BPM clock with BPM sync output for other C/M modules

modules.name: vcClk++
modules.description: Clock multiplier for vcClk (can be used as a standalone clock with cv input)

modules.name: 1hp blank
modules.description: May the Light shine forever upon You

modules.name: vcClk--
modules.description: Clock divider for vcClk (can be used as a standalone clock with cv input)

modules.name: bitStep
modules.description: Receives a trigger to sample a binary value which gets passed on when the next trigger is received, made to be chained together
